text: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: Modern poets talk against business, poor things, but all of us write for money. Beginners are subjected to trial by market.
author: Robert Frost

text: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

text: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
author: Albert Camus
